scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix functions
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run emulators"
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix functions && firebase deploy
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix functions
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules client/dist functions/node_modules functions/lib node_modules
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix functions
